llm.emotional_summary: I'm happy and excited to receive my new credit card!
llm.overall_experience_feedback: The application process was quick and easy. I liked how straightforward the form was, and I appreciated the clear instructions on each page.  The only minor issue I encountered was a formatting error with my income.  I had to remove the comma; otherwise, it was a very smooth process.  I'm so excited to get approved and start using my new credit card!
suggestions: Improve error handling by accepting numbers with commas or other regional formatting.
Consider adding a progress bar to show users how far along they are in the application process.
